hadith.chapterTitle: Kind Treatment towards Parents and establishment of the ties of Blood Relationship
hadith.body:
Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "May he be disgraced! May he be disgraced! May he be disgraced, whose parents, one or both, attain old age during his life time, and he does not enter Jannah (by rendering being dutiful to them)".

[Muslim].
- وعنه عن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم قال‏:‏ ‏"‏ رغم أنف، ثم رغم أنف، ثم رغم أنف من أدرك أبويه عند الكبر، أحدهما أو كليهما، فلم يدخل الجنة‏"‏ ((رواه مسلم))
